subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: As a Yankees contingent travels to China next week to establish a new stronghold for baseball, another group, headed by Mets General Manager Omar Minaya, will travel to Ghana for a four-day goodwill tour.
snippet: As a Yankees contingent travels to China next week to establish a new stronghold for baseball, another group, headed by Mets General Manager Omar Minaya, will travel to Ghana for a four-day goodwill tour.
